heading: rants & raves
subheading: date: mon, 6 dec 1999 13:16:13 -0600 from: jdearinger@mmm.com to: newsfeedback@wired.com subject: good job! although i definitely have an opinion on the topic of porn on the internet and would take the conservative side, i do appreciate your seemingly unbiased neutral writing (“does the smut stop here?,” 6.dec.99). you included points from both side from […]
author: wired blogs
text: date: mon, 6 dec 1999 13:16:13 -0600 from: jdearinger@mmm.comto: newsfeedback@wired.comsubject: good job!although i definitely have an opinion on the topic of porn on the internet and would take the conservative side, i do appreciate your seemingly unbiased neutral writing ("does the smut stop here?," 6.dec.99). you included points from both side from real experts and that is good newswriting in my opinion. it's rare these days to read an article that seems to just be well balanced news and information. good job.
